Posts.EditableText: Hi! Here's the newbie in Quest (not in if writing ) I am writing if in german and trying out quest 5 at the moment. I made two rooms and connectes them with an pathway in both directions (nord-south / south/north) In PLAY Mode I can type S (stands for south or the german "Süden") or N (stands for north or the german "Norden") to go to the other room. Possible Exits are shown as hyperlinks in the player. If I "click" f.i. "Norden", then I get the response Go Norden Ich verstehe nicht, was du meinst. (Can't understand, waht you want) My question: Where can I change the GO to the german "gehe" or where will I be able to "don't show" the GO? Thank you!
Posts.HTML:
Hi!
Here's the newbie in Quest (not in if writing )
I am writing if in german and trying out quest 5 at the moment.

I made two rooms and connectes them with an pathway in both directions (nord-south / south/north)

In PLAY Mode I can type S (stands for south or the german "Süden") or N (stands for north or the german "Norden") to go to the other room.

Possible Exits are shown as hyperlinks in the player. If I "click" f.i. "Norden", then I get the response

Go Norden
Ich verstehe nicht, was du meinst. (Can't understand, waht you want)

My question:
Where can I change the GO to the german "gehe" or where will I be able to "don't show" the GO?

Thank you!

Posts.EditableText:
Hi Dax,
open the deutsch.aslx in the Quest-programdirectory (/languages) with an external texteditor and search for
[code:1rtfmdwa]<template name="Go">Go</template>[/code:1rtfmdwa]

Change it to 
[code:1rtfmdwa]<template name="Go">Gehe</template>[/code:1rtfmdwa]
